Procs

proc getBounds(L: float): seq[Line] {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
For a given lightness, return a list of 6 lines in slope-intercept form that represent the bounds in CIELUV, stepping over which will push a value out of the RGB gamut   Source Edit 
proc maxSafeChromaForL(L: float): float {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
For given lightness, returns the maximum chroma. Keeping the chroma value below this number will ensure that for any hue, the color is within the RGB gamut.   Source Edit

proc xyzToRgb(xyz: Coord): Coord {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
XYZ coordinates are ranging in [0;1] and RGB coordinates in [0;1] range. @param xyz An array containing the color's X,Y and Z values. @return An array containing the resulting color's red, green and blue.   Source Edit 
proc rgbToXyz(rgb: Coord): Coord {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
RGB coordinates are ranging in [0;1] and XYZ coordinates in [0;1]. @param rgb An array containing the color's R,G,B values. @return An array containing the resulting color's XYZ coordinates.   Source Edit 
proc yToL(Y: float): float {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CIELUV In these formulas, Yn refers to the reference white point. We are using illuminant D65, so Yn (see refY in Maxima file) equals 1. The formula is simplified accordingly.   Source Edit

proc xyzToLuv(xyz: Coord): Coord {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
XYZ coordinates are ranging in [0;1]. @param tuple An array containing the color's X,Y,Z values. @return An array containing the resulting color's LUV coordinates.   Source Edit

proc hsluvToLch(hsluv: Coord): Coord {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
HSLuv values are ranging in [0;360], [0;100] and [0;100]. @param hsluv An array containing the color's H,S,L values in HSLuv color space. @return An array containing the resulting color's LCH coordinates.   Source Edit 
proc lchToHsluv(lch: Coord): Coord {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
HSLuv values are ranging in [0;360], [0;100] and [0;100]. lch - An array containing the color's LCH values. @return An array containing the resulting color's HSL coordinates in HSLuv color space.   Source Edit
